directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain and run under cold water.  Transfer to a large bowl with ham and apples and set aside.

In a small bowl, whisk together the preserves, apple jelly, horseradish, mustard and black pepper.  Pour over the ham/pasta mixture and toss to combine.  Cover and refrigerate salad for 30 minutes.  When ready to serve, place mixed salad greens on 4 plates and arrange ham salad on top.
ingredients: 2 apples, cored and sliced with peel
title: Spicy Ham and Apple Pasta Salad
